data.text: Introducing a new era for the Twitter Developer Platform! nn📣The Twitter API v2 is now the primary API and full of new featuresn⏱Immediate access for most use cases, or apply to get more access for freen📖Removed certain restrictions in the Policynhttps://t.co/Hrm15bkBWJ https://t.co/YFfCDErHsg

Our mission remains just as important as ever: to deliver an open platform that serves the public conversation. We’re continuing to innovate on the Twitter API v2 and invest in our developer community 🧵nnhttps://t.co/Rug1l46sUc

Catch up on recent launches and build with the core elements of the Twitter experience:n🔖 New Bookmarks endpointsn💬 New Quote Tweets lookup endpointsn🔼 New sort_order parameter on search endpoints, and improvements to the Likes and Retweets endpoints
